subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: As Coach Avery Johnson grappled with what to do with MarShon Brooks on a team with a wealth of talent at guard, the Nets lost their first preseason game at home against the Celtics.
snippet: As Coach Avery Johnson grappled with what to do with MarShon Brooks on a team with a wealth of talent at guard, the Nets lost their first preseason game at home against the Celtics.
